description: This file defines an authentication context provider component for a React application, utilizing Supabase for auth and user profile management. It includes context creation, hooks for accessing auth state, and functions for sign-in, sign-up, sign-out, and profile refresh functionalities.

methods.name: useAuth()
methods.description: Custom React hook to access authentication context.

methods.name: AuthProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component providing authentication state and methods to its children via context, managing session, profile, roles, and integration with Supabase for authentication.

methods.name: fetchProfileAndRoles
methods.description: Asynchronous helper function to fetch user profile and roles from the database based on user ID.

methods.name: signIn
methods.description: Function to authenticate user with email and password, updating session and profile state.

methods.name: signUp
methods.description: Function to create new user with email and password, setting default role and profile information.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Function to log out the user and clear session/profile roles state.

methods.name: refreshProfile
methods.description: Function to forcibly refresh user profile data from the database.
